ygData.subject: Re: Naggy Raids
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Also an enchanter to tashani, and stun if it isn t resisted.  You would also have to have plenty of FS daggers and a mage to summon his dagger since a pet
ygData.messageBody:
:) This would be hard! You should also have a bard in the group to play mana song.
Also an enchanter to tashani, and stun if it isn't resisted. You would also have to
have plenty of FS daggers and a mage to summon his dagger since a pet can't duel wield
two weapons of the same kind.

Manuael






"Fletcher, Neal L SGT 224 MI BN" wrote:

> From: "Fletcher, Neal L SGT 224 MI BN" <FletcherNL@...>
>
> Actually, they capped the LT at about 5-6 levels above you. Since Vox/Naggy
> are "Officially" lv 53, a necro would have no problem sucking them dry. In
> fact, I have a theory about this. Get 6 lv 50 Necro's with pets, and 6 lv
> 50 clerics, and once the giants are taken care of, I think with the clerics
> healing the pets (I'd give them some nice, cheap, fast weapons,
> bloodclaw's.. etc) the dragons could be taken with only a few deaths.
>
> > This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be tolerated
